Title: Valid Login with Correct Credentials
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Click on 'Login' button

Title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Password (1st attempt)
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter incorrect password | Click on 'Login' button

Title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Password (2nd attempt)
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter incorrect password | Click on 'Login' button

Title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Password (3rd attempt)
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter incorrect password | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: 'Account locked for 10 minutes due to multiple failed login attempts.'

Title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Email
Steps: Enter incorrect email | Enter valid password | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: 'Incorrect email or password. Please check and try again.'

Title: Password Reset via 'Forgot Password' link
Steps: Click on 'Forgot Password' link | Enter registered email | Follow password reset instructions
Expected: 'A password reset email has been sent to your registered email.'

Title: Successful Redirect to Dashboard after Login
Steps: Enter valid email | Enter valid password | Click on 'Login' button

Title: Error Message for Invalid Credentials
Steps: Enter invalid email | Enter invalid password | Click on 'Login' button
Expected: 'Incorrect email or password. Please check and try again.'
